title: France's former health minister placed under investigation for 'endangering lives' amid widening probe into government's pandemic response
content:
1. France's former health minister placed under investigation for 'endangering lives' amid widening probe into government's pandemic response  The Washington Post
  2. Agnès Buzyn: France ex-health minister under investigation  BBC News
  3. Former French Health Minister Buzyn to be questioned by judges • FRANCE 24 English  FRANCE 24 English
  4. France’s former health minister charged over handling of Covid crisis  The Guardian
  5. Former French minister under formal investigation over COVID policies  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: フランス政府のパンデミック対応に関する調査が拡大する中、前保健大臣が「人命を危険にさらした」として調査を受けることになりました。
法国前卫生部长因 "危害生命 "而被调查，同时对政府应对大流行病的调查也在扩大。
法國前衛生部長因 "危害生命 "而被調查，同時對政府應對大流行病的調查也在擴大。
